channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- User Profile Builder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- User Profile Builder

item.title: CVE-2024-6695|2024-07-31T15:06:31.038Z -- unknown -- user%20profile%20builder
item.description: it's possible for an attacker to gain administrative access without having any kind of account on the targeted site and perform unauthorized actions. This is due to improper logic flow on the user registration process.

item.title: CVE-2024-6366|2024-07-29T18:35:53.964Z -- unknown -- user%20profile%20builder
item.description: The User Profile Builder WordPress plugin before 3.11.8 does not have proper authorisation, allowing unauthenticated users to upload media files via the async upload functionality of WP.

item.title: CVE-2024-6366|2024-07-29T06:00:08.248Z -- unknown -- user%20profile%20builder
item.description: The User Profile Builder WordPress plugin before 3.11.8 does not have proper authorisation, allowing unauthenticated users to upload media files via the async upload functionality of WP.

item.description: The User Profile Builder WordPress plugin before 3.11.8 does not have proper authorisation, allowing unauthenticated users to upload media files via the async upload functionality of WP.

item.title: CVE-2024-6695|2024-07-31T06:00:04.649Z -- unknown -- user%20profile%20builder
item.description: it's possible for an attacker to gain administrative access without having any kind of account on the targeted site and perform unauthorized actions. This is due to improper logic flow on the user registration process.
